segments.text: I see two children embarking on a very secret mission in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is balanced precariously on a two-step stool, reaching into a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks quite wobbly; its legs are splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't lose his balance and fall backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is standing beside him, her hand eagerly outstretched for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet prize, completely oblivious to the overflowing sink nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy has a plate in his other hand, maybe to catch the cookies or as a makeshift lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a clever little heist they've got going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so intent on their goal, their faces full of concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their mischievous collaboration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, that stool looks incredibly unstable, making me hold my breath a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They really should be more careful with their adventures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the lure of "COOKIE JAR" must be too strong to resist.
segments.speaker: PAR
